<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Instant Armor](/Spells.aspx?ID=935)
<actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Contingency" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=385" />
<trait label="Extradimensional" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=67" />
<trait label="Metal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=505" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 112 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 10 minutes ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 24 hours
</row>

</column>

---

Upon casting this spell, the armor you're wearing is whisked away into an extradimensional space that's linked to you. If the armor is [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) and [invested](/Traits.aspx?ID=98) by you, it remains invested while in this space, though you don't gain its benefits. You then gain the Armor Up! action; once you use the action, the spell ends. If the action hasn't been used by the time the spell's duration ends, the extradimensional space collapses, ejecting the armor's pieces on the ground under you.

 **Armor Up!** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Effect** You snap your fingers. The armor returns to your body.
name: Instant Armor
